DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess whether the BASIC Scale--a simple, non-invasive clinical triage protocol--predicts severe illness, hospitalization or death among children under age five presenting for acute care in a rural African health center.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of the Basic Assessment of Severity of Illness in Children (BASIC) Scale
DOC.criteria: Child aged two months to five years presenting routine or urgent care in an ambulatory facility
DOC.keyword: Acute illnesses in children under five
